Name: Courage and Honor
About the game: The game is about two bold knights, which were sent to the gripping and dangerous adventure by the supreme magitian from a small village standing at the edge of the world. You are going to make it through different obstacles and kill hazardous creatures. Fight in winter and summer, beneath and above the surface of the earth. You do not have any right to fail, because the prosperity and lives of village people depend solely on you.
